title: Calories in an Egg McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in egg mcmuffin from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: McDonald's standard Egg McMuffin: English muffin, folded egg, Canadian bacon, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard McDonald's data; check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Egg McMuffin provides ~300 kcal, 17 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 300 kcal for one standard McDonald's Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 17 g protein per Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: Is egg mcmuffin high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 760 mg sodium, which is 33% of daily value.
Roughly 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber from the muffin.
Removing the egg reduces it to ~200 kcal; egg adds about 100 kcal.
